Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a Redis Pub/Sub manager class in Java that handles publishing and subscribing to Redis channels, including connection management and resource cleanup.

Class Description: RedisPubSubManager is a class that manages Redis publish/subscribe operations using a connection pool. It provides methods to start subscribers and publishers on a specified channel, and handles connection lifecycle management.

Attributes:
- jedisPool: JedisPool - The connection pool for Redis connections
- channelName: String - The name of the channel to publish/subscribe to
- logger: Logger - Logger instance for logging operations and errors

Methods:
- RedisPubSubManager(String host, int port, String channelName) -> void - Constructor that initializes the Redis connection pool with the specified host, port, and channel name
- startSubscriber(Subscriber subscriber) -> void - Starts a subscriber thread that listens to messages on the configured channel using the provided subscriber implementation
- startPublisher() -> void - Starts a publisher that can send messages to the configured channel
- shutdown() -> void - Closes the connection pool and releases all resources
